verbs.description: tgi fridays [V: is] overhauling its entire menu a visit to the struggling chain proves why that is necessary tgi fridays is overhauling its entire menu with plans to have replaced or improved 100 of items by the end of 2018 a trip to the chain shows that some of the changes are not the improvements that tgi fridays desperately needs cmo stephanie perdue chain tgi fridays
